title: Watch Calculator
description: A simple and handy calculator for your Android Wear device.
descriptionHTML: A simple and handy calculator for your Android Wear device.
comments: Great for square watches This is the best calculator I could find. It only does simple tasks as it is not a scientific calculator but that's exactly what I need. It also has feedback for button presses which is awesome!
Non starter Installed to G Watch R and won't even start! Message "unfortunately  calculator has stopped"

Will not open Every time I try to open it on my Moto 360, it gives me the "unfortunately, Calculator has stopped" message. I noticed another review with the same complaint that the developer had replied to, saying they were working to fix this as fast as possible. This reply was left almost a year ago. I'd skip this app if you have a Moto 360. :(
Doesn't work Downloaded it for LG G watch R, went to open it on the watch and shows message that it's stopped working. Please fix.
Doesn't work on LG G Watch R "stopped working" even before showing anything
Not Working Fails to work on LG G Watch R
recentChanges: - Make sure your watch is compatible with Android Wear.
- Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.
